name: Food Online for WooCommerce
author: Arosoft.se

sections.description:
A restaurant ordering system for WooCommerce. Simple to use. Looks smooth on desktop and mobile.

Insert the Menu with shortcode [foodonline] or [foodonline2] on any page or override the shop page if you like.

Choose between a one- or two-column menu layout and customize the menu with colors, icons, and borders.
With product attributes, you can offer your dishes with varieties of sizes, proteins, etc.

The plugin is also available in a premium version with extended features.
The plugin is compatible with WooCommerce Product Add-Ons if you want to offer even more product options and with Live Order Confirmation if you like incoming orders immediately pushed into the order table and need the ability to approve new customer orders.

If you are in need to complement your store with the ability for customers to validate their address or postcode at the shop page, check out the plugin Check My Address or Check My PostCode.
sections.installation:
After activation, add your dishes as WooCommerce simple or variable products.

With variable products you are able to make a dish with choices of size or protien etc.

Use WooCommerce product Categories to sort dishes under menu titles.

Go to WooCommerce -> Settings -> Food Online to setup the Menu color, product image style and the popup style.
sections.faq:
Is it possible to define the delivery area through a drawn zone?

Yes, Food Online is compatible with the free plugin Shipping Zones by Drawing.

Does this work with WooCommerce Add-Ons?

Yes, from version 1.6 it´s compatible with WooCommere Add-ons.

You could then offer toppings, side dishes and more.

In what order does categories and product items appear in the Menu?

Like WooCommerce default. It´s possible to change the order at the Category settings page.

Why does the page reload when I´m removing an item from the minicart?

Go to WooCommerce -> Settings -> Products and check the option “Enable AJAX add to cart buttons on archives”.
Then the page will not reload when removing an item from the minicart.

sections.reviews:
Nice

By matijaaaaaaaaaaa on February 5, 2023

Nice!

Permanet notification to go premium.

By hcporto on January 15, 2023

Can't hide the admin sitewide message to go premium. You close it and it is always back there when you navigate.

La mejor en su especie!

By fabito1 on October 27, 2022

Es genial, seguramente la competencia a puesto 1 estrella, yo le doy 10

Have been really satisfied

By anttik on September 24, 2021

Really awesome support (Pro version in use) and can be modified kinda well to match different type of visual needs. Allows you to build Foodora like WooCommerce shop.

* UPDATE - Fantastic features - Even got support on the weekend!

By uk2021 on April 30, 2021

Shame I cant give them 6 stars... The Food Online developers continue to impress. Support is still there and they have even added extra functions after a support question (which are now available on the update). The plugin is running on a website providing Delivery, Pickup and eat at restaurant service. The end client is very happy with the plugin and the kitchen staff like the ability to sort WooCommerce orders buy dispatch/delivery times. I really hope these guys get the Wordpress 5 star user review they deserve for the plugin!! Original Review: Like this plugin a LOT and I've tried a few.... Paid for the premium (good value for money vs features). I had problems finding a setting (my own problem for skim reading the instructions!), emailed support at the weekend and they pointed me in the right direction. This plugin has everything needed to do DELIVERY, COLLECTION and TABLE SERVICE options. The time adjustment settings are great and I cant see any issues as yet! Great job developers! Looking forward to seeing the future progress.

Not recommended

By klaszewski on March 15, 2021

Support is very slow - if none. I have several problems and questions that are still unresolved after 2 months of ping pong of emails. Plugin has potential, but it needs better service. I bought Pro because of functionality, but it has many problems - even with their own other plugin.

No Support, even for paying users

By makucode on January 20, 2021

I first tried out the free version of this plugin and was mostly satisfied that far, but I wanted to try out the premium features and and bought the premium version. Quickly I noticed a few bugs and asked for help in the support section but didn't get a response, so after 2 weeks of waiting and my client getting impatient I have to find a different solution for my delivery website and decided to give this plugin a one star rating. Pretty disappointed and would definitely not recommend buying!

Plugin perfecto para Delivery & Take Away!

By wiwitorz on December 8, 2020

Todo lo necesario para empezar tu restaurante online!

Excellent Plugin!

By josimarcsilva on August 31, 2020

Excellent Plugin! The Free version is very good, but the premium version is fantastic. It's worth the investment. Thank you for bringing this to the community!

SUPPORT LACKING

By saliw on August 23, 2020

Too many support topics with no response and no resolution after months. Who would buy the premium product under such circumstances?
